turkish_example_sentence: Biz toplu taşıma araçlarını kullanmış olsaydık, trafikte çok zaman kaybetmezdik
english_example_sentence: If we had used public transportation vehicles, we would not have wasted much time in traffic
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы использовали общественный транспорт, мы бы не потеряли много времени в пробках
